nBeams: Number of beams must be a positive integer. Maximum beams:
experimentName: Experiment name must not  be empty
Length: The length must be a  real number greater than zero
Delta: The amplitude must be  positivereal number
Angle: The angle must be a real number
Step: Step must be a  real number greater than zero
Offset: Offset must be a real number
IsInParam: Volume is entirely outside volume world
Radius: The radius must be a  real number greater than zero
N copies: N. copies must be a  integer number greater than zero
N copies X: N. copies X must be a  integer number greater than zero
N copies Y: N. copies Y must be a  integer number greater than zero
N copies Z: N. copies Z must be a  integer number greater than zero
PHANTOM: Solid type must be BOX for PHANTOM parameterisation
innerouter: The inner radius must be smaller than the outer radius
phiLength: Delta phi must be less than or equal to 360 degrees
thetaLength: Delta theta must be less than or equal to 180 degrees
Energy: Energy must be a valid positive float
Time: Time must be a valid positive float
Position: Position must be a valid float
Direction: Direction must be a valid float
energyRange: Min. energy must be smaller than max. energy
Activity: Activity must be a positive real number
Life time: Life time must be a positive real number
Mass number: Mass number must be a positive integer
Excitation energy: Energy must be a positive real number
Atomic number: Mass number must be greater than atomic number
Empty data: You must have selected at least one data
minmax: Lower limit must be less than upper limit
nbins: N. of bins must be greater than or equal to zero
errorXMin: Min. X value must be a real number
errorXMax: Max. X value must be a real number
errorYMin: Min. Y value must be a real number
errorYMax: Max. Y value must be a real number
errorPythiaProcesses: You must select a minumum process
errorPythiaEnergy: Energy must be a positive real number and CM energy must be greater than 10 GeV
pseudorapidity: Pseudorapidity must be a positive real number
Rapidity: rapidity must be a real number
magnetic: Magnetic field must be a valid real number
electric: Electric field must be a real number
Momentum: Momentum must be a real number
Counter: Min. bin and max. bin must be a integer numbers.
ValidCharName: The name must not be empty and must be contain only alphanumeric characters
ValidText: The description must not be empty and must not be greater than 150 characters
Grade: Grade must be a positive integer number
errorJSONFormat: Experiment file must be a JSON file
dataError: Error in action, scorer or filter list
